description: Enterprise techniques used by Gamaredon Group, ATT&CK group G0047 v1.0
name: Gamaredon Group (G0047)

techniques.comment: A Gamaredon Group file stealer has the capability to steal data from newly connected logical volumes on a system, including USB drives.[1]
A Gamaredon Group file stealer transfers collected files to a hardcoded C2 server.[1]
Gamaredon Group tools contained an application to check performance of USB flash drives.[1]
Tools used by Gamaredon Group are capable of downloading and executing additional payloads.[1]
Gamaredon Group has used various batch scripts to establish C2, download additional files, and conduct other functions.[1]
A Gamaredon Group file stealer can communicate over HTTP for C2.[1]
A Gamaredon Group file stealer can gather the victim's computer name and drive serial numbers to send to a C2 server.[1]
A Gamaredon Group file stealer can gather the victim's username to send to a C2 server.[1]
